page.title: 05ORTHOPAEDIC HOSPITAL
page.content: The Orthopaedic Hospital is one of the few hospital of its type in the {world.} The children are woken up at 6:30 am.They have breakfast at 7:30, which is usually cereal. After breakfast they are allowed to sleep until about 9:00 am, which is when the teacher arrives to give them work. At 12:00 they have lunch which is usually sandwiches, they then carry on with school work until 3:30pm. If they finish they can have a walk outside as long as a nurse is with them. A little group go swimming for a few hours for leisure. At 5:00 they have tea which is usually a salad or a cooked meal. After tea they can do what they want. Most of them play, read, or watch television.
